data.text:
@JoeLitobarski @adam_tooze Acolytes of Buchanan, Friedman et al interpreted “anything we can do, we can afford” into malevolent, poisonous practice > empower oligarchy over democracy; deregulate environmental protection >> Earth’s ecosystems existential crises 
https://t.co/r5JVskGMY1

@JoeLitobarski @adam_tooze Just cut to the chase without making a false comparison with the most generic l, clickbait FDR quote possible - are you saying that covid is a hoax? This is poor and lazy writing 😫

@JoeLitobarski @adam_tooze I've got a brilliant quote .
Do you know it? 

" Workers of the World Unite .."

It starts 

"You have nothing to fear , but....?"

K.Marx.

Not bad for boring history
Old geezer with a beard .
British library ?.
